SEARCH
Package networking.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
networking.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Represents a client handler responsible for managing communication with an individual client in the Othello game server.

Each instance of this class is associated with a specific client, handling input and output streams for communication.

Version:
1.0, 12/07/2023
Author:
Dinh Thuy Nhat Vy
See Also:
  • OthelloServer
  • ServerGame
  • Mark
  • ClientUnavailableException

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ServerGame
    game
    The ServerGame instance representing the game the client is part of.
    private Mark
    mark
    The Othello game mark (BLACK or WHITE) assigned to the client.
    private BufferedReader
    reader
    The BufferedReader used for reading input from the client's socket.
    private OthelloServer
    server
    The OthelloServer instance managing the overall game.
    private Socket
    socket
    The socket associated with the client, used for communication.
    private String
    username
    The username associated with the client.
    private BufferedWriter
    writer
    The BufferedWriter used for writing output to the client's socket.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler(Socket socket, OthelloServer server) throws IOException
      Constructs a ClientHandler instance with the specified socket and OthelloServer.
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket associated with the client.
      server - the OthelloServer managing the game.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while creating input and output streams.

    • sendInputToClient

      public void sendInputToClient(String serverInput) throws ClientUnavailableException
      Sends the specified server input to the associated client.
      Parameters:
      serverInput - the server input to be sent to the client.
      Throws:
      ClientUnavailableException - if the client is currently unavailable.

    • handleClientCommand

      private void handleClientCommand(String receivedCommand) throws ClientUnavailableException
      Handles the client command by parsing and executing the corresponding action.
      Parameters:
      receivedCommand - the command received from the client.
      Throws:
      ClientUnavailableException - if the client is currently unavailable.

    • handleClientDisconnection

      private void handleClientDisconnection()
      Handles the disconnection of the client, notifying the server and shutting down the client handler.

    • shutDown

      protected void shutDown()
      Shuts down the client handler by closing streams, sockets, and removing itself from the server's client handlers.
